data.question: What is the chemical formula of PCMOF-3?
What method was used to obtain single crystals of PCMOF-3?
data.answer: Diffusion of acetone into a solution of Zn(ClO4)·6H2O and H6L in water.

data.question: At what temperature range was the TGA-DSC data for PCMOF-3 recorded?
What is the proton conductivity of PCMOF-3 at 25 °C and 98% relative humidity?
What does the low activation energy of 0.17 eV for proton transfer in PCMOF-3 indicate?
data.answer: It indicates that the ordered water molecules observed crystallographically function to transport protons via a Grotthuss hopping mechanism.

data.question: Is the structure of PCMOF-3 stable up to 450°C according to TGA data?
Does PCMOF-3 require secondary sulfonic acid sites for its proton conductivity?
What is the role of Zn-ligated water molecules in PCMOF-3?
data.answer: They serve to anchor free water molecules into ordered chains for proton conduction.

data.question: Was the proton conductivity of PCMOF-3 measured in a deuterated sample?
What technique was used to study protonic motion in PCMOF-3?
Did the proton conductivity of PCMOF-3 decrease at lower humidity levels?
What does the presence of two distinct P sites in 31P NMR spectra of PCMOF-3 indicate?
data.answer: It indicates two distinct phosphorus environments consistent with the crystal structure.

data.question: Is the proton transfer mechanism in PCMOF-3 based on Grotthuss hopping?
What was the purpose of using Pt–C gas diffusion electrodes in impedance analyses of PCMOF-3?
data.answer: To observe the loss of the capacitive tail at low frequencies, confirming proton migration.

data.question: Was the crystal structure of PCMOF-3 solved at both 173 K and 293 K?
What does the ordered arrangement of water molecules in PCMOF-3 suggest about its proton conduction mechanism?
data.answer: It suggests that PCMOF-3 is well-organized to enable Grotthuss proton transfer.

data.question: Did the synthesis of PCMOF-3 involve refluxing water?
What was the yield of Zn3L(H2O)2·2.5H2O synthesized?
What does the activation energy of 0.17 eV for proton transfer in PCMOF-3 compare to?
data.answer: It is among the lowest observed, similar to highly acidic, hydrated metal oxide proton conductors.

data.question: Is the proton conductivity of PCMOF-3 independent of humidity levels?
